post.body: I'm off to dream of Neil Diamond, lol
NIGHT!
that's cool! I'll have to look into it when I'm more awake.
I don't even know what that is...twitterfeed?
well, I'm tired so everything is lol ;)
LOL
just for a week
wouldn't it be cool if you could have a replacement husband ... hmmm
mine's from Canadian Tire, where else, lol.
your tree look great! I think it's the same tree I have.
'oh bother' as in what Whinnie the Poo says? LOL
report them to twitter spam. Just type @ spam (without the space) and @ with the name of the spammer
I know what you mean. Some kind of closure would be good. Maybe Nancy Grace will move on to a new topic - she drives me nuts!
I KNOW! And I'm easily confused as it is.
lol...yes, or that crazy nurse who twitters here once in a while ;)
I always said it would be near their home 'cause Casey said she thought Caylee was near home and safe. Damn.
LOL - omg, yes. See, Claire had me all confused.
really? OMG - I watched her parents on Larry King last night - I feel so bad for them.
the doctor looked like speedy ... oh yeah, you're right I was a guy ... I forgot about that! HA
oh no, not younger. Besides imaginary Vincent is perfect with lots of money ;)
no, he's imaginary ... therefore he's perfect. HAHA
Yes! He's my imaginary husband. ;)
contrary to rumour, she's not related to Chucky HAHA
LOL
oh yes, I'm canuckian :)
you're so cute when you're jealous
haha - I'll have to check his site out too.
I find that hard to believe, but these internet quizes are very scientific.
you don't think. You didn't notice?
well I hope it's non-sexual, HAHAHA! But you know, I'm very open minded.
LOL
And he's 6'4"
ONE - THREE
THIRTEEN!
haha....yep. 2004 was a sexy year for him. Well, any year is but that's what I'm watching now.
let's make it one. Ta Da! It's a word now.
lol - yeah, I can get lost at youtube but it's fun.
it's not that big of a deal! lol Just pick one!
yes,I have mine ready to go. Dolly & Kenny - Christmas to Remember.
:D
just checking with Sis, she and my niece are going out tomorrow...I give them $$....I'm such a brat!
lol, yeah, those others in the house are probably a lot harder to train!
lol....maybe. They helped, keep the seat down!
My cats are so wise, I've raised them well.
ahhh...good one. I was thinking Canada Dry but that didn't make sense.
'fraid to ask ... but what?
hey, this is canada, the whole seal thing is okay
oh you do not! Well, I remember when I was young I didn't even know what ivory was - I though it was just a type of stone
Oh that must have been wonderful!
you said "oddball" not me. But I may use it at some point in the future to describe you ;)
I encouraged her off with some treats! HAHA
lol...poor Jaffer getting lectured. Don't tell him about Olga then.
I'm blog visiting...
Night tweeters :)
Damn Vincent D'Onofrio is a sex god. Just sayin'
I've got some music monday going on http://tinyurl.com/8shg6l
Just realized xmas is Thurs - I should start shopping tomorrow.
Now Moses is sitting on the laptop - makes it hard to twitter
Moses is curled up on the converter box because it's warm and now I can't change the channel! LOL
